anya-e0105n27:1_0: Visuddhimaggo pana na kevalaṁ pubbe vuttappakāreneva kato,
anya-e0105n27:1_2: Tathā hi ācariyabuddhaghosatthero porāṇaṭṭhakathāhi samāharitvā bhāsāparivattanavasena dassentopi yā
anya-e0105n27:1_3: yā atthavaṇṇanā vā vinicchayo vā saṁsayitabbo hoti,
anya-e0105n27:1_23: 80) evaṁ taṁtaṁatthavaṇṇanāvinicchayānaṁ nissayampi vibhāvetvā pacchimajanānaṁ uppajjamānasaṁsayaṁ vinodentoyeva te dassesi.
anya-e0105n27:2_0: Tenimassa visuddhimaggassa karaṇakāle sabbāpi sīhaḷaṭṭhakathāyo ācariyassa santike santīti ca,
anya-e0105n27:2_1: pubbeyeva tā ācariyena sīhaḷattherānaṁ santike sutāti ca,
anya-e0105n27:2_2: tāhi gahetabbaṁ sabbaṁ gahetvā ayaṁ visuddhimaggo ācariyena likhitoti ca ayamattho ativiya pākaṭo hoti.
anya-e0105n27:3_0: “Saṅgho gāthādvayaṁ tassā’dāsi sāmatthiyaṁ tavā”tiādinā “gāthādvayameva oloketvā kiñcipi aññaṁ potthakaṁ
anya-e0105n27:3_1: anoloketvā ācariyabuddhaghoso visuddhimaggaṁ akāsī”ti adhippāyena abhitthutivacanaṁ vuttaṁ,
